appName.description: The name of the add-on, displayed in various places.

appDesc.message: Ajoute des flèches de changement de vue dans la barre d’outils du panneau des dossiers et active automatiquement la vue « Tous les dossiers » lors d’un glisser-déposer.

lblckbx_showFPA.message: Afficher les flèches de changement de vue

lblnmbr_delayBFVS.message: Délai de changement de vue (en millisecondes) :

folderPaneModeHeader_all.description: The name of the view, as in the folderPaneModeHeader_* keys in https://searchfox.org/comm-central/source/mail/locales/en-US/chrome/messenger/messenger.properties

folderPaneModeHeader_unread.description: The name of the view, as in the folderPaneModeHeader_* keys in https://searchfox.org/comm-central/source/mail/locales/en-US/chrome/messenger/messenger.properties

folderPaneModeHeader_favorite.description: The name of the view, as in the folderPaneModeHeader_* keys in https://searchfox.org/comm-central/source/mail/locales/en-US/chrome/messenger/messenger.properties

folderPaneModeHeader_recent.description: The name of the view, as in the folderPaneModeHeader_* keys in https://searchfox.org/comm-central/source/mail/locales/en-US/chrome/messenger/messenger.properties

folderPaneModeHeader_smart.description: The name of the view, as in the folderPaneModeHeader_* keys in https://searchfox.org/comm-central/source/mail/locales/en-US/chrome/messenger/messenger.properties

folderPaneModeHeader_tags.description: The name for the 'Tags' view, as there is no counterpart for folderPaneModeHeader_*, best match would be 'tags' as in https://searchfox.org/comm-central/source/mail/locales/en-US/chrome/messenger/messenger.properties#245
